then.line: I think this one means... that you're going to stand atop a tower.
Me? Stand?
OH MY GOD!
What?!
I... have no idea what that means!
Maybe just that... that you're going to spend a lot of time on a tower.
Hmm. I wonder what kind of tower. There aren't a lot of towers in town, except...
Except what?
Nah. Nothing. I'm sure it's not about that. I wonder if it's a figurative tower.
Or maybe... maybe I'M the tower! I AM kind of tower-shaped, right?
I would say so!
So maybe the card's trying to tell me to look inwards. To search my innermost desires...
And become what I've always known I was meant to be.
But I guess it's all about what the cards mean together, right?
Probably.
So in that case...
I think it means you'll spend your days destroying great towers!
Oh no! That's a terrible future for an architect!
Unless it means you're destroying towers so you can build even better ones!
Oh. True...
UNLESS!
What if I'm destroying towers... of mozzarella sticks and marinara?!
Maybe?
I know, I know. We should look at what the cards mean together, right?
Uh... right! Which means...
This means you'll spend your days building great towers!
Hm! That definitely sounds like architecture to me...
But I suppose we've gotta look at how all the pieces fit together right?
Uh...right! Which means...
